contents: What about the downsides of casinos? Gambling addiction can be a serious problem. However, if casinos contribute to anti-addiction services, the costs outweigh the rewards. Solutions to gambling addiction should focus on identifying and assisting addicts. Research shows that casinos do not lead to financial ruin for residents. A 2004 study of personal bankruptcy rates near riverboat gaming showed that access to gambling  had “no statistically significant impact on personal bankruptcy filings.”
